Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GyroController  
    UltrasonicController  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArmController
    This class is used to control the robot's two arms
    Display
    This class is used to display the content of the odometer variables (x, y, Theta)
    DPMFinalProject  
    Gyro  
    LightLocalizer  
    Navigation
    This class is used to drive the robot on the demo floor.
    Odometer
    This class implements odometer methods to compute coordinates of the robot
    OdometerData
    This class stores and provides thread safe access to the odometer data.
    TreeController
    This class handles all logic related to interacting with the tree and rings
    TunnelFollower
    This class prepares for, and executes tunnel traversal
    UltrasonicLocalizer
    This class implements falling or rising edge localization to direct the robot towards true 0 degrees
    UltrasonicPoller
    Control of the wall follower is applied periodically by the UltrasonicPoller thread.
    WifiController
    The following class obtains the game data map from the server and returns it to the main class
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TreeController.Color  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OdometerExceptions
    This class is used to handle errors regarding the singleton pattern used for the odometer and odometerData
